actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law which grant automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress.

summary.text: Repeals the automatic cost-of-living increases of Congressional salaries provided for by the Salary Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law which grant automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress.
